quotes.quote: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Stupid is forever, ignorance can be fixed.
quotes.author: Don Wood

quotes.quote: The last time anybody made a list of the top hundred character attributes of New Yorkers, common sense snuck in at number 79.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Everybody gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: [Common sense] is the best sense I know of.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: The freethinking of one age is the common sense of the next.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: Nowadays most people die of a sort of creeping common sense, and discover when it is too late that the only things one never regrets are one's mistakes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Nothing astonishes men so much as common sense and plain dealing.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If an idea's worth having once, it's worth having twice.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard
